name: KGEAR GS2
headline: Single 18-inch compact passive subwoofer
description: A compact single 18-inch birch subwoofer that quietly underpins lounges, studios and sanctuaries with musical, controlled low end.
story: GS2 is the workhorse sub for rooms that need honest bass without consuming floor space. The birch enclosure, SpeakON connectivity and 134 dB ceiling make it a natural partner for GP columns and distributed hospitality systems, as well as modern houses of worship.
definition: Single 18-inch birch subwoofer delivering 34 Hz to 150 Hz response for boutique venues and worship spaces.
specs: Type: Passive enclosure with single 18" ferrite driver
Frequency response 34 Hz - 150 Hz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 134 dB with omni coverage
Power handling 800 W at 8 ohm
Dimensions 546 x 610 x 590 mm
Birch plywood cabinet with IP43 rating

lifestyle.alt: GS2 18-inch subwoofer shown at an angle
Close-up of the GS2 front grille and logo
Rear panel of GS2 with SpeakON connectors and hardware

name: KGEAR GS4
headline: Dual 18-inch passive low-frequency engine
description: A dual 18-inch subwoofer that doubles the GS foundation, delivering club-weight impact and ballroom warmth from a single enclosure.
story: GS4 adds a second 18-inch driver in the same birch footprint, providing higher headroom for venues that need more air moved per cabinet. With a 139 dB ceiling and straightforward NL4 wiring, it partners naturally with GP18 or GPX tops in premium lounges, clubs and large ballrooms.
definition: Dual 18-inch passive subwoofer tuned for 34 Hz to 150 Hz output with touring-grade hardware.
specs: Type: Passive dual 18" enclosure
Frequency response 34 Hz - 150 Hz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 139 dB with omni coverage
Power handling 1600 W at 4 ohm
Dimensions 1025 x 610 x 590 mm
Birch plywood shell with IP43 rating

lifestyle.alt: GS4 dual 18-inch cabinet viewed from the front
Port and grille detail of the GS4 subwoofer
Side view of the GS4 enclosure positioned on the floor

name: KGEAR GS6A
headline: Compact active architectural subwoofer for hidden bass
description: A micro active architectural subwoofer that slips into joinery or under seating, adding subtle, tactile low end to premium spaces.
story: GS6A is intended for built-in projects where a traditional subwoofer would be too visible. A 100 W Class-D module drives six small woofers from a 12–24 V DC supply, so electronics can live in a central rack while the cabinet hides under benches, inside millwork or behind seating.
definition: Compact active subwoofer with six small drivers running from 12–24 V DC for architectural installations.
specs: Type: Active compact enclosure with six woofers
Frequency response 55 Hz - 140 Hz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 108 dB with omni coverage
Class-D amplifier delivers 100 W @ 2 ohm (24 V DC)
Connectors: dual Phoenix (balanced in, mute, power pass), 24 V DC input
Operates on 12-24 V DC, draws 30 W at 1/8 power
Dimensions 170 x 310 x 310 mm, 3.2 kg, IP43

lifestyle.alt: GS6A compact subwoofer standing on the floor in a room
Side view of the GS6A showing enclosure depth and terminals

name: KGEAR GS218A
headline: Dual 18-inch active infrastructure subwoofer
description: An arena-ready dual 18-inch active subwoofer that anchors large GP systems with deep, controlled energy and touring-grade headroom.
story: GS218A couples a rigid birch enclosure with two 18-inch transducers and an integrated four-channel Class-D engine that can also feed external tops. The result is a low-frequency module that can sit on the floor or under stages while driving flown arrays in arenas, mega-clubs or outdoor pavilions.
definition: Dual 18-inch active subwoofer with 4 x 1500 W amplification and 30 Hz extension for large-format systems.
specs: Type: Dual 18" enclosure with onboard amplification
Frequency response 30 Hz - 150 Hz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 138 dB with omni coverage
Class-D engine rated 4 x 1500 W @ 4 ohm
Power handling 3000 W and 4 ohm nominal impedance
Dimensions 1035 x 614 x 600 mm, 59 kg
Birch plywood, IP43 rating, SpeakON and power I/O

lifestyle.alt: GS218A active subwoofer with front grille visible
Rear view of the GS218A showing amplifier module and I/O panel
Angled perspective of the GS218A enclosure in a large venue

name: KGEAR GS1
headline: Compact 12" passive subwoofer
description: A compact 12-inch subwoofer that slips into smaller rooms, lending them a grounded, cinematic sense of scale.
story: GS1 provides powerful 12" subwoofer performance in a compact cabinet perfect for smaller installations.
definition: Compact 12" subwoofer for smaller venues and residential applications.
specs: Type: Passive enclosure with single 12" ferrite driver
Frequency response 45 Hz - 150 Hz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 128 dB with omni coverage
Power handling 500 W at 8 ohm
Dimensions 400 x 450 x 420 mm
Birch plywood cabinet with IP43 rating

name: KGEAR GS6
headline: 6-driver compact subwoofer for architectural installs
description: A slim six-driver architectural sub that hides in the design yet rounds out systems with gentle, evenly distributed bass.
story: GS6 utilizes six compact drivers in a slim profile perfect for architectural integration where space is at a premium.
definition: Architectural subwoofer with six compact drivers for discrete installation.
specs: Type: Passive enclosure with six compact drivers
Frequency response 60 Hz - 140 Hz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 118 dB with omni coverage
Power handling 200 W at 8 ohm
Dimensions 200 x 350 x 350 mm
Compact design, IP43 rating

name: KGEAR GS218
headline: Passive dual 18" infrastructure subwoofer
description: A passive dual 18-inch infrastructure sub that forms the quiet backbone of large venues and touring rigs.
story: GS218 provides the foundation for large-scale audio systems with dual 18" drivers in a robust passive configuration.
definition: Passive dual 18" subwoofer for large venue and touring applications.
specs: Type: Passive dual 18" enclosure
Frequency response 30 Hz - 150 Hz (-6 dB)
Max SPL 136 dB with omni coverage
Power handling 2000 W at 4 ohm
Dimensions 1035 x 614 x 600 mm
Birch plywood shell with IP43 rating

name: KGEAR GU210
headline: Premium ultra-compact 10" active subwoofer
description: An ultra-compact 10-inch active subwoofer that tucks neatly into premium rooms, adding tight, articulate weight beneath the main loudspeakers.
story: GU210 delivers exceptional low-frequency performance from an ultra-compact 10" active subwoofer designed for premium installations and high-end systems.
definition: Ultra-compact 10" active subwoofer for premium applications.
specs: Type: Active 10" subwoofer
Driver: 10" high-excursion woofer with 400W Class D amplifier
Frequency response 35 Hz - 120 Hz (-3 dB)
Max SPL 120 dB with precision response
Input: XLR/TRS combo, volume control
Dimensions 300 x 350 x 350 mm
Premium cabinet with advanced DSP processing
